title: Client is unusable 8.6 patch
body:
I opened my client this morning and the game began the usual auto update. When it started to download it showed 8GB remaining which there is a notification present in the client telling everyone that its a bug so i just left it. half an hour later i come back to see the download progress still sitting on 0% i decided to restart my client. Doing so, the 8GB download now jumped down to 4GB, but still not moving a single bite. After fully restarting my computer i log back in the third time to see that there is no download remaining and can click on "Play". as i do so i can open a lobby but the lobby is blank, i cant select my roles or exit out of it without closing the client when i relaunch the same issue occurs. I decided to do a full repair of my client which restarted it and nothing else happened. 

Have my local files gone completely corrupt over night while my pc was off or did 8.6 completely scuff other peoples client as well. No notifications i can see about any of these issues inside the client and nothing on the forums either. Any ideas?

I do have an idea. I want you to try running the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and tell it to "force repatch." It sounds like a file or two is corrupted or not playing nice. Let's see if that fixes the issue. I would also recommend that you do not restart your computer while it's doing this as you might make the problem worse.
